page.title: 10EDUCATION IN THE BUSBY AREA
page.content: From the ages of 5 to 12 all children must go to a{Primary}school.Most go to the state schools which are Carolside and Busby Primaries.The Primary school day is{9.00 to 3.30}with two intervals and an hour's lunchbreak.Lunches are supplied in the school for those who do not go home.Each class (normally 30 pupils) has the same{teacher}all day. The teacher gets some help from visiting teachers of music and physical education.Although both schools are in old buildings(Busby is almost 100 years)they use modern equipment such as computers. All pupils are encouraged to wear {uniform}which is a black blazer,grey trousers or skirt with a different tie for each school.When the children are 12 they go to{Secondary School}outside the area.Some children attend{private {schools}outside the area.
